# sse_security_profile (Data Source)

Fetches a single Security Profile by name.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Find a specific security profile by name
data "sse_security_profile" "web_profile" {
  name = "Web Profile"
}

output "profile_id" {
  value = data.sse_security_profile.web_profile.id
}

output "profile_details" {
  value = data.sse_security_profile.web_profile
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the security profile to find.

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) The ID of this resource.
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `priority` (Number)
